text: Allah Taalaa aik misal biyan farmata hai kay aik ghulam hai doosray ki milkiyat ka jo kissi baat ka ikhtiyar nahi rakhta aur aik aur shaks hai jissay hum ney apney pass say maqool rozi dey rakhi hai. Kiya yeh sab barabar ho saktay hain? Allah Taalaa hi kay liye sab tareef hai bulkay inn mein say aksar nahi jantay
